Name: Chain Reaction
Descriptions: Why try touching your nose around the head, when you can touch it from the front? In this contest, the former might just win you the prize. Execute a simple mechanism in the most complicated way possible, and you might just walk away with the prize.
Rules: Teams will be given three chances to complete the system
Time for arrangement of the system is 3 hours
Participants will be provided with 230v power supply
System should contain minimum of 10 steps
The pillars should be made to fall only by direct physical contact
20 points for the middle pillar, 10 points for pillars next to the middle pillar on the either side of the middle pillar, 5 points for the pillars at both end
10 points for each step included in the system
Manual interactions are allowed at 3 checkpoints
No check points -15 points; 1 check point -10 points; 2 check points -5 points
Special points will be awarded for Moving mechanisms like robots, cars etc and Use of wind and water energy
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
